name: @temando/dbpromise
description: a thin wrapper around dblite that adds promises

scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --recursive --timeout 25000 -R nyan --ui bdd test
scripts.profile: NODE_ENV=test node --allow-natives-syntax ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --recursive --timeout 15000  --reporter mocha-performance test/**/*.test.js > profile.json && mpviz -i profile.json
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib

author: Andrew Gallagher <andrew.gallagher@temando.com>
